caption.p: Analysis of the gH/gL/gO-PDGFRα complex. Size exclusion chromatography profile of the gH/gL/gO alone ( a), or complexed with PDGFRα ( b), or PDGFRα and the Fab fragment of the anti-gH mAb 13H11 ( c). The shift in the elution time of ( b) and ( c) complexes compared to ( a) is indicated by vertical dotted lines. (d) SDS-PAGE in reducing conditions of individual proteins and complexes, as indicated. ( e– g) EM negative staining of gH/gL/gO alone ( e), complexed with PDGFRα (indicated by a red dotted line) bound to gO ( f), and with PDGFRα (indicated by a red dotted line) and the Fab of mAb anti-gH 13H11 (indicated by a yellow dotted line) bound to the twisted region of gH ( g). ( h) EM 3D map of gH/gL/gO at 19.3 Å resolution (from [ 68]).
